metadata.title: CVE-2017-9078 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The server in Dropbear before 2017.75 might allow post-authentication root remote code execution because of a double free in cleanup of TCP listeners when the -a option is enabled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-9078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-bin - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-initramfs - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-run - 2017.75-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2017.75-3build1').
